sections.purpose: To provide controlled temperature with orbital shaking for liquid culture growth.
sections.scope: Applicable to broth culture incubation in Microbiology.
procedure: Set the required temperature and shaking speed on the control panel.
Allow the incubator chamber to reach the set temperature.
Place culture flasks on the shaker platform and secure with clamps.
Close the door firmly and start the shaker function.
Monitor the unit for abnormal noise or vibration.
At the end of incubation, stop the shaker and open the door.
Remove flasks carefully to avoid spills.
Clean any spills inside the chamber with disinfectant.
precautions: Balance the load evenly on the platform to prevent strain on the motor.
Use flasks with baffles and suitable closure to permit aeration.
Do not exceed the maximum RPM recommended by the manufacturer.
Ensure the door is fully closed during operation.
Avoid abrupt changes in speed to prevent flask breakage.
